phrases: the harder it is to write well.
Since I came to this island, there are times when I really want to write calligraphy.
If I only had that hand-trembling feeling now...
Maybe taking a bath will help my mood.
Reheat Do Not Heat Empty Tub
Reheat Do Not Heat Empty Tub
How long before someone can come to repair it?
For this occasion, want to try going all-out?
Burn wood in here, and it will heat up the bath.
My house has a wood-heated bath, too.
There are hills near your house.
You need dry twigs for it to burn.
He is already in gung-ho mode.
I cannot say it is too much trouble!
I have to do this for a week?
Sensei, you ought to find yourself a wife to manage the fire.
I would like a gas-heated bath more than a wife.
Do not you have a girlfriend with plans to marry?
I have spent my whole life just writing calligraphy.
I am the type who ends up dying alone.
He is not disagreeing with me...
Okay, you can handle the rest.
Is not that smoke coming from Sensei's house?
Is he cooking over a fire?
Would Sensei do that sorta thing?
Do not go scarin' people, Sensei.
But if it is a bath, relax.
You know how to do this?
But put it out if it gets too big.
Are you sure you will be all right?
but it is kind of exciting, like I am visiting a hot spring.
Ahh, I have come back to life...
It is permeating right to the bone.
I can see why the village chief is into this.
It is like a reward for the effort.
They thought there was a fire.
A kid tendin' the fire while you have a nice bath?
As punishment, we will see you naked!
I do not get your reasoning!
Were not ya really wantin' young girls to see ya?
Do not talk like I am an exhibitionist!
There is no fire here, so leave!
As always, he cannot take a joke.
I thought I would collect reference material for my manga.
But ya cannot show full nudity, even in manga, right?
It will be fine, if I add a mosaic over the tip.
So long as you can get the idea...
No, it is still no good.
Looks like I cannot take a bath during the day.
I will wait until they get bored and leave.
No, do not you run away, too!
At any rate, that turned my mood around.
so I am making you lunch.
I feel like even I could make this.
Combine miso and sugar, and mix!
Sensei, did not you watch me?
What, are not they the same?
It is all the same once you eat it.
It looks awful but tastes great.
That is what men's cooking is like!
Uh, no... this will definitely taste awful, too.
All I can taste is cucumber.
You just said it was great!
I never said it was great.
All I can taste is miso.
If you are older, act your age and admit defeat!
If she came over in such a rush, then it must be an emergency!
We do not need to rush so much for a child's emergency.
Naru's getting picked on by grade schoolers from the next village!
Actually, that looks like a lot of fun.
We just took over this place!
We have not gotten along with the neighboring village for ages.
How dare you call someone you have just met a fox-faced jerk?
Sure, sometimes people say I have a mean look in my eyes,
He only just met you, yet he can tell that you are good-for-nothing and a wimp.
With punks like these, tough talk will not work.
He is got dyed blonde hair!
You all are bigger'n these kids,
so cannot ya be nice to'them?
If yer going to say it that way...
I will show him how harsh society can be!
Actually hitting a kid will just because more problems!
Sensei, we were wantin' to play dodgeball here.
Well, then, we cannot back down now.
These kids are counting on me.
Now is the time to show some dignity!
We are adults, so we do not use violence.
However, if you guys throw your weight around here any more,
I will have to make a phone call.
Who are ya going to call?
What makes ya think the police would come?!
I will give an anonymous tip that you guys are bullying little kids.
It will upset your parents, too.
You will be ruined for life.
Dang it, yer usin' dirty threats!
You finished off my cell phone!
It is just got poo on it.
Do not give me that, you brat!
Sure, it no longer works as a phone,
but it is still served me faithfully as a clock!
Cannot use it as a phone?
You insulted my phone, so why are you getting mad?!
No, I would never laugh at that.
Let us leave'them and go play baseball.
They are trying to ignore us!
Do not make me repeat myself!
Middle schoolers took over our playground!
A real tough-fightin' girl and a glasses girl.
That are not got nothing to do with it!
Did not ya say adults are not violent?
If an adult from this village hits us,
If an adult hits a kid, that is who is going to the police!
You will get arrested for child abuse!
If they put it that way, we cannot argue.
Right, an adult should never strike a child.
Naru, they want to play baseball here.
You shoulda done that in the first place!
So how about we play dodgeball?
You were going to yield this place to us!
Play all the baseball you want.
We are going to play our own game.
Sensei and I will be outfielders.
It do not count if it do not hit us!
If they take the ball, it is all over.
Dang it, yer supposed to be adults!
Why are ya takin' this seriously?!
It is because we are adults!
I am impressed they can horse around in this heat.
What are ya doing out here?!
Hey, I am stuck on that game ya lent me!
We are going to go play with Akki.
You are giving up that easily?!
I am sorry for interrupting your fun.
Uh, no, it was not really...
I am heading back to my house.
We play it up that way!
the most realistic Tarzan setting I have ever seen.
Is not that a real vine?!
I will show ya how it is done!
This does not look fun at all.
Okay, it is yer turn next, Sensei!
Yer pretty lame for a grown-up!
You would not say that if you had an adult's physique!
There is no way this vine could support an adult's weight.
Though, if all of you could hang from it at once, it would be a different story.
So, will ya do it too, Sensei?
But I am begging you, do not do anything dangerous in front of me!
This will be gobs of fun!
You may be trying to convince me of that,
but I am not happy about it.
As long as this vine is here, they are going to get hurt someday.
Sorry, kids, but I am getting rid of this dangerous toy.
I will pretend to swing, and tear it off!
No, Sensei, you cannot stretch it like that!
Are any of you guys hurt?
I thought I was going to die!
I thought I was going to die!
I thought I was going to die!
I thought I was going to die!
I said it is just a scratch!
That will only get bacteria in it!
Day after day I play with kids,
but do not get anything out of it.
Is it really okay to just wait for inspiration to strike?
The God of Calligraphy has descended!
I never thought I would find the desire to write this easily!
I have to rush home and write!
Right now, I can do it!
He just went home a different way without tellin' us.
There was not anyone here when we came.
On our way back from the mountain,
I Want to Be a Hermit
A wild giant from the hills must have trapped him and gobbled him up!
Monster or not, it is still worrisome that he has not returned yet.
Even if he got lost in the hills, the forest are not that deep.
And I finally felt like I could write good calligraphy...
The time I just spent playing with the kids feels far in the past.
I am panicking so much that my brain's started to fabricate memories!
A little further up, and I will be back on the path.
Pose to reduce surface area in contact with ground
Is not it about time someone came to rescue me?!
I am going to end up dying alone, literally.
What, it is just a key?
It is a key to my house!
Maybe while playin' in the hills out back?
What am I freaking out about?
I am in the hills behind my house!
Who the heck gets hopelessly lost in his own backyard?
Please let me get home soon and write calligraphy!
I told ya he fell off the edge.
No wonder he was not on the usual paths when we looked.
Sensei, I am so glad yer safe!
He is in the middle of work.
As I thought, inspiration really is important.
